item.text: Now I commend to you our sister Phoebe, who is a servant of the church in Cenchrea,
so that you may welcome her in the Lord in a way worthy of the saints and provide her with whatever help she may need from you, for she has been a great help to many, including me.
Greet Prisca and Aquila, my fellow workers in Christ Jesus,

<st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="5294" class="">risked</st> <st data-num="1438">their own</st> <st data-num="5137" class="">necks</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>. <st data-num="3756" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> are <st data-num="2168">grateful</st> to <st data-num="3739">them</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Also</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27">dear friend</st> <st data-num="1866" class="">Epenetus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the <st data-num="536" class="">first convert</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> in the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st>, <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="2872" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">very</st> <st data-num="2872" class="">hard</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="408" class="">Andronicus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2458" class="">Junia</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4773" class="">compatriots</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4869">fellow prisoners</st>. <st data-num="3748" class="">They</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1978">well known</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="291" class="">Ampliatus</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27">dear friend</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="3773" class="">Urbanus</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4904">fellow worker</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27">good friend</st> <st data-num="4720" class="">Stachys</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="559" class="">Apelles</st>, who is <st data-num="1384" class="">approved</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>. <st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> those who <st data-num="1537" class="">belong to</st> the household of <st data-num="711" class="">Aristobulus</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="2267" class="">Herodion</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4773" class="">compatriot</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> those <st data-num="1537">in the household of</st> <st data-num="3488" class="">Narcissus</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="5170" class="">Tryphena</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5173" class="">Tryphosa</st>, <st data-num="2872" class="">laborers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>. <st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> my <st data-num="27">dear friend</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4069" class="">Persis</st>, <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="2872" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">hard</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="4504" class="">Rufus</st>, <st data-num="1588" class="">chosen</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> who was <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> a mother to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="799" class="">Asyncritus</st>, <st data-num="5393" class="">Phlegon</st>, <st data-num="2060" class="">Hermes</st>, <st data-num="3969" class="">Patrobas</st>, <st data-num="2057" class="">Hermas</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="5378" class="">Philologus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2456" class="">Julia</st>, <st data-num="3517" class="">Nereus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3652" class="">Olympas</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">believers</st><n id="1" /> who are <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
Greet one another with a holy kiss. All the churches of Christ greet you.
Now I urge you, brothers and sisters, to watch out for those who create dissensions and obstacles contrary to the teaching that you learned. Avoid them!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> these are the <st data-num="5108" class="">kind</st> who do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1398" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1438">their own</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">appetites</st>. <st data-num="1223" class="">By</st> their <st data-num="5542">smooth talk</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2129" class="">flattery</st> they <st data-num="1818" class="">deceive</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">minds</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="172" class="">naive</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> is <st data-num="864" class="">known</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> and <st data-num="3767">thus</st> I <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4680" class="">wise</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> what is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="185" class="">innocent</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> what is <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st>.
The God of peace will quickly crush Satan under your feet. The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you.
Timothy, my fellow worker, greets you; so do Lucius, Jason, and Sosipater, my compatriots.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>, <st data-num="5060" class="">Tertius</st>, who am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> this <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>, <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.
Gaius, who is host to me and to the whole church, greets you. Erastus the city treasurer and our brother Quartus greet you.
Now to him who is able to strengthen you according to my gospel and the proclamation of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery that had been kept secret for long ages,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> is <st data-num="5319" class="">disclosed</st>, <st data-num="5037">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4397" class="">prophetic</st> <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> has been <st data-num="1107">made known</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st>, <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="2003" class="">command</st> of the <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1519">to</st> bring about the <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>—
to the only wise God, through Jesus Christ, be glory forever! Amen.
